About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I started to program during my freshmen year in our school at STI College Malolos. I always keep on studying how to code, and during our IT Projects, I often selected as one of the lead programmers in a group for the past four years. C# is our primary programming language to develop our Projects. We also used web development like HTML, CSS, Javascript, and PHP, but I didn't focus much on it at that time.

During my internship, I got involved in becoming a UI/UX Designer, and it took my interest. After the internship, I started to discover more of the web development and get my self more involved in it. After watching on youtube and Udemy courses, I have decided that this is the path that I wanted to pursue, to become a web developer.

I will work smarter & harder to pursue my dreams for my family. And I will be dedicated to my job and love it to be able to contribute to the company.

Pierre & Paul Solutions Inc.

UI/UX Designer, Graphics Designer & Tech. Supp. ( Intern )

I serve as an IT intern at Pierre and Paul Solutions Inc., as I have gained valuable insight into the IT industry for over the past three months. Because they allowed me to work on a variety of Projects, I had the chance to observe numerous aspects in IT industry, from designing User Interface & User Experience of a web & mobile application, to editing advertisements in photoshop, and to maintain computers & network. They were extremely welcoming and helpful and offered me a piece of excellent career advice. This internship had increased my interest in pursuing a career in the IT Industry.
